name: Froguelike (Omar)
description:
You’re trapped in a looping dungeon, every move you make is slowly pushing you further into the dungeon! Collect the five coins and fight your way out!

Froguelike is a turn based puzzle roguelike made in Pulp for the Playdate.

Arrow keys to move,  bump into enemies to fight!

Game music “EntranceHall” created by Choosh!

https://play.date/
